name: Lil' Cappy
description:
Lil' Cappy wants to help the baby critters find their way back to their parents. Use the arrows to move & spacebar to pick up/put down babies. R to reset the game. Use speakers/headphones.

(once all the babies have been rescued, the game is "over" but you may still wander & explore)

--

Completed in under two weeks for LOWREZJAM 2016 - the requirements being that the game screen be 64x64 pixels.

--

Art/code by Dan Emmerson : Demmy.net / @DoodleDemmy

Music by Paws Menu : paws.bandcamp.com / @thesaveroom

SFX done with BFXR : http://www.bfxr.net/
